channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: BYU, Kalani Sitake Agree to Extension After Coach Drew Interest from Penn State
item.description: Kalani Sitake will remain BYUâ€™s head football coach after agreeing to a new long-term contract extension on Monday.

item.title: Cameron Boozer Scores 29 to help Duke Stave off Florida's Comeback Effort
item.description: Isaiah Evans hit a go-ahead 3-pointer with 19.7 seconds left, and No. 4 Duke held on to beat No. 15 Florida 67-66 in the ACC/SEC Challenge

item.title: FIFA World Cup 2026 Draw: Heidi Klum, Kevin Hart to Co-Host Star-Studded Event
item.description: Supermodel/TV personality Heidi Klum and actor-comedian Kevin Hart will co-host the World Cup draw.

item.title: No. 1 Purdue Boilermakers vs. Rutgers Scarlet Knights Highlights | FOX College Hoops
item.description: Check out the best moments from this Big Ten clash between the No. 1 Purdue Boilermakers and the Rutgers Scarlet Knights.

item.title: 4 Takeaways From the Fifth CFP Rankings Release of 2025
item.description: FOX Sports' RJ Young offers up four takeaways from the fifth reveal of the College Football Playoff rankings.
